ruleset.name: Apex Best Practices Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex best practices (modifiers, test classes, code quality)

rule.name: TestClassIsParallel
rule.message: Test classes must have @IsTest(IsParallel=true) annotation to enable parallel test execution
rule.description:
Test classes must include IsParallel=true in their @IsTest annotation to enable parallel test execution. This improves test performance by allowing tests to run in parallel, reducing overall test execution time and improving developer productivity.
Version: 1.0.1
